mapper.insert: INSERT INTO JB_EXEC_HIST (JB_ID, BIZ_AREA_ID, TRGT_ID, JB_EXEC_CNT, JB_EXEC_ED_TM, JB_EXEC_ST_TM) VALUES (#{jbId}, #{bizAreaId}, #{trgtId}, #{jbExecCnt}, '99991231235959', TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'))

INSERT INTO JB_EXEC_DTL (JB_ID, BIZ_AREA_ID, TRGT_ID, JB_EXEC_CNT, JB_EXEC_ITM_ID, JB_ITM_EXEC_ED_TM, JB_ITM_EXEC_ST_TM) VALUES (#{jbId}, #{bizAreaId}, #{trgtId}, #{jbExecCnt}, #{jbExecItmId}, '99991231235959', TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'))
mapper.select: SELECT JB.JB_ID AS jbId, JB.JB_NM AS jbNm, JB.JB_TYP AS jbTyp, JB.JB_ST_TM AS jbStTm, JB.JB_UPT_TM AS jbUptTm, JB_TRGT_REL.EXEC_SEQ AS execSeq, BIZ_AREA.BIZ_AREA_ID AS bizAreaId, BIZ_AREA.BIZ_AREA_NM AS bizAreaNm, BIZ_AREA.BIZ_AREA_DESCR AS bizAreaDescr, BIZ_AREA.BIZ_AREA_ST_TM AS bizAreaStTm, BIZ_AREA.BIZ_AREA_UPT_TM AS bizAreaUptTm, TRGT.TRGT_ID AS trgtId, TRGT.TRGT_NM AS trgtNm, TRGT.TRGT_TYP AS trgtTyp, TRGT.IP AS ip, TRGT.PRT AS prt, TRGT.DBMS_TYP_ID AS dbmsTypId, TRGT.USR_ID AS usrId, TRGT.PW AS pw, TRGT.SID AS sid, TRGT.SCHM AS schm, TRGT.TRGT_ST_TM AS trgtStTm, TRGT.TRGT_UPT_TM AS trgtUptTm FROM JB, JB_TRGT_REL, BIZ_AREA, TRGT WHERE JB_TRGT_REL.JB_ID = JB.JB_ID AND JB_TRGT_REL.BIZ_AREA_ID = BIZ_AREA.BIZ_AREA_ID AND JB_TRGT_REL.TRGT_ID = TRGT.TRGT_ID AND JB.JB_ID = #{jbId} ORDER BY JB.JB_ID, JB_TRGT_REL.EXEC_SEQ

SELECT JB_ID AS jbId, JB_EXEC_CNT AS jbExecCnt, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(ST_TM, 'YYYYMMDD HH24:MI:SS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS jbExecSt, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(EN_TM, 'YYYYMMDD HH24:MI:SS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS jbExecEd FROM ( SELECT JB_ID, JB_EXEC_CNT, MIN(JB_EXEC_ST_TM) ST_TM, MAX(JB_EXEC_ED_TM) EN_TM FROM JB_EXEC_HIST WHERE JB_ID = #{jbId} GROUP BY JB_ID, JB_EXEC_CNT) ORDER BY JB_ID, JB_EXEC_CNT

SELECT JB_ID AS jbId, JB_EXEC_CNT AS jbExecCnt, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(ST_TM, 'YYYYMMDD HH24:MI:SS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS jbExecSt, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(EN_TM, 'YYYYMMDD HH24:MI:SS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS jbExecEd FROM ( SELECT JB_ID, JB_EXEC_CNT, JB_EXEC_ST_TM ST_TM, JB_EXEC_ED_TM EN_TM FROM JB_EXEC_HIST WHERE JB_ID = #{jbId} AND BIZ_AREA_ID = #{bizAreaId} AND TRGT_ID = #{trgtId}) ORDER BY JB_ID, JB_EXEC_CNT

SELECT Y.JB_ID AS jbId, Y.BIZ_AREA_ID AS bizAreaId, Y.BIZ_AREA_NM AS bizAreaNm, Y.TRGT_ID AS trgtId, Y.TRGT_NM AS trgtNm, Y.TRGT_TYP AS trgtTyp, Y.IP AS ip, Y.PRT AS prt, Y.DBMS_TYP_ID AS dbmsTypId, Y.USR_ID AS usrId, Y.PW AS pw, Y.SID AS sid, Y.SCHM AS schm, Y.EXEC_SEQ AS execseq, Y.SEQ AS seq, Y.CLCT_TAB_ID AS clctTabId, Y.CLCT_TAB_NM AS clctTabNm, JB_EXEC_DTL.JB_EXEC_CNT AS jbExecCnt, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(JB_EXEC_DTL.JB_ITM_EXEC_ST_TM, 'YYYYMMDD HH24:MI:SS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS jbItmExecStTm, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(JB_EXEC_DTL.JB_ITM_EXEC_ED_TM, 'YYYYMMDD HH24:MI:SS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS jbItmExecEdTm FROM ( SELECT X.*, DBMS_TYP_PER_CLCT_TAB.SEQ, CLCT_TAB.* FROM ( SELECT JB_TRGT_REL.JB_ID, JB_TRGT_REL.EXEC_SEQ, BIZ_AREA.BIZ_AREA_NM, TRGT.* FROM JB_TRGT_REL, BIZ_AREA, TRGT WHERE JB_TRGT_REL.JB_ID = #{jbId} AND JB_TRGT_REL.BIZ_AREA_ID = BIZ_AREA.BIZ_AREA_ID AND JB_TRGT_REL.TRGT_ID = TRGT.TRGT_ID) X , DBMS_TYP_PER_CLCT_TAB, CLCT_TAB WHERE X.DBMS_TYP_ID = DBMS_TYP_PER_CLCT_TAB.DBMS_TYP_ID AND DBMS_TYP_PER_CLCT_TAB.CLCT_TAB_ID = CLCT_TAB.CLCT_TAB_ID) Y, JB_EXEC_DTL WHERE Y.JB_ID = JB_EXEC_DTL.JB_ID AND Y.BIZ_AREA_ID = JB_EXEC_DTL.BIZ_AREA_ID AND Y.TRGT_ID = JB_EXEC_DTL.TRGT_ID AND Y.CLCT_TAB_ID = JB_EXEC_DTL.JB_EXEC_ITM_ID AND JB_EXEC_DTL.JB_EXEC_CNT = #{jbExecCnt} ORDER BY Y.JB_ID, Y.EXEC_SEQ, SEQ

SELECT Y.SQL_ID AS sqlId, Y.SQL_TEXT AS sqlText FROM ( SELECT JB_EXEC_HIST.BIZ_AREA_ID, JB_EXEC_HIST.TRGT_ID, MAX(JB_EXEC_ED_TM || ',' || JB_ID || ',' || JB_EXEC_CNT) CON_COL FROM JB_EXEC_HIST WHERE JB_EXEC_HIST.BIZ_AREA_ID = #{bizAreaId} AND JB_EXEC_HIST.TRGT_ID = #{trgtId} GROUP BY JB_EXEC_HIST.BIZ_AREA_ID, JB_EXEC_HIST.TRGT_ID) X , (SELECT * FROM ORA_SQLAREA) Y WHERE Y.JB_ID = REGEXP_SUBSTR(X.CON_COL, '[0-9A-Z]+', 1, 2) AND Y.BIZ_AREA_ID = X.BIZ_AREA_ID AND Y.TRGT_ID = X.TRGT_ID AND Y.JB_EXEC_CNT = REGEXP_SUBSTR(X.CON_COL, '[0-9A-Z]+', 1, 3)
